title: :information_source: Profiles :person_raising_hand:
description: Profiles allow TTBTrackr to get ahold of you. To setup your profile, use /profile edit

fields.name: Basic Features
fields.value: By default, TTBTrackr uses Discord Direct Messages to notify you of vacnacies in courses. However with the expansion of profiles, TTBTrackr's means of communication increases exponentially

fields.name: Instagram Integration
fields.value: If setup, TTBTrackr will send you a DM on Instagram when a vacancy is found. This is useful if you don't have access to Discord at all times, but still want to be notified of vacancies. To setup Instagram integration, use `/profile edit` and include your Instagram username in the Slash Command options

fields.name: SMS Integration
fields.value: New to TTBTrackr is the ability to notify you via SMS when a vacancy is found. **Please note this feature is limited to Canadian phone numbers only**. To setup SMS integration, use `/profile edit` and include your phone number in the Slash Command options. **Please note that by using this feature, you agree to allow TTBTrackr to store your phone number in its database, and to send you SMS messages when a vacancy is found**

fields.name: Phone Call Notifications
fields.value: Coming soon to TTBTrackr is the ability to deploy phone-call notifications. This feature is currently in development and will be released in the near future. Stay tuned!

fields.name: Setting up contact preferences
fields.value: If you would like to disable certain contact methods, you can do so by using `/profile contact`

fields.name: Deleting your Profile
fields.value: To delete your profile, use `/profile delete`. This will remove all of your information from TTBTrackr's database and remove you from all courses you are currently tracking. **Please note that this action is irreversible. If you would like to recover your tracked courses, you will have to add them back manually**
